title: At Novopavlivka direction Russian army shelled Heorhiyivka, Paraskoviyivka, Kostyantynivka, Vuhledar of Donetsk region. Russi...
content: At Novopavlivka direction Russian army shelled Heorhiyivka, Paraskoviyivka, Kostyantynivka, Vuhledar of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Krasnohorivka, Kostyantynivka, Antonivka of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
